main.title: Next-level leadoff work by Acuna
main.text:
Ronald Acuna Jr. became the 4th player -- first since '99 -- to lead off BOTH games of a DH with a HR.

main.text: In the midst of a career year, Padres reliever Kirby Yates is taking your questions in the Edward Jones Chatting Cage. Tweet at #ChattingCage or use your webcam. Enter >

main.text: Braves rookie phenom Ronald Acuna Jr. leads off both games of a day-night doubleheader with a home run, his 16th and 17th on the year

main.title: Harper's 29th HR of the season
main.text: Bryce Harper breaks the tie in the top of the 4th inning with a solo home run to right-center field, his 29th jack of the season

main.title: J.D., Zim slug way to POW honors
main.text: Major League Baseball recognized last week's top performers Monday, naming the Red Sox's J.D. Martinez and the Nationals' Ryan Zimmerman as the American League and National League Players of the Week presented by W.B. Mason.

main.title: deGrom K's 12 at Yankee Stadium
main.text: Jacob deGrom tosses 6 2/3 strong innings against the Yankees, allowing two earned runs on five hits and two walks while striking out 12

main.title: Jeff Banister showed no fear making a stellar grab on a Ronald Guzman hard foul into the dugout
main.text: This was after he was in the path of a Eduardo Escobar foul ball, too.

main.title: This date in history
main.text: Braves manager Bobby Cox gets ejected for the 132nd time in his career on Aug. 14, 2007, setting a Major League record

main.title: Carry the Freight: J.D. Martinez
main.text: J.D. Martinez is the overall Carry the Freight winner, hitting .464 with four homers and 11 RBIs over the past seven days
